Articles.Content:
Hi guys i bought my copy of KSP and i decided to transfer to steam but when i go to my profile i don't see the transfer to steam button?

Please can somebody tell me what should i do and yes i did buy my copy before it was available on steam!
Check at the bottom of that page. There should be an option there or a web link.

Hi guys i bought my copy of KSP and i decided to transfer to steam but when i go to my profile i don't see the transfer to steam button?

Please can somebody tell me what should i do and yes i did buy my copy before it was available on steam!

You will need to e-mail SQUAD support about this issue, as the community team has no control over the store. You can find the appropriate e-mail address on the main KSP site.
The transfer to Steam options is only available to players who bought the game before it was released on Steam.
